h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fireproof Mantle Location
content: This will require you to search around for all of the bells which can be found in the Forest of Wolves and Bamboo Grove. Our guide has a full step-by-step walkthrough of where to find these bells and gain access to the secret Ancient Guanyin Temple area. Additionally, you can find our video guide below:

This is an excerpt from the file 'Fireproof_Mantle.md', within the main section titled 'Fireproof Mantle', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fireproof Mantle Location'.
The content is as follows:
This will require you to search around for all of the bells which can be found in the Forest of Wolves and Bamboo Grove. Our guide has a full step-by-step walkthrough of where to find these bells and gain access to the secret Ancient Guanyin Temple area. Additionally, you can find our video guide below:
